options.label: User friendly name of NTP Server entry
options.name: ntp-name

options.label: IP or DNS name of NTP Server
options.name: ntp-server

options.description: > Current NTP Server list, as shown in provisioning screens
options.label: Current NTPServer Entries
options.name: ntp-servers-current

commands.script:
file=/opt/cw/options/ntp-servers.json
filetmp=/opt/cw/tmp/ntp-servers.tmp
if [ ! -f "$file" ]; then echo "[]" > "$file"; fi
jq '. += [{"name":"@option.ntp-name@","value":"@option.ntp-server@","selected":@option.default@}]' $file > $filetmp
\cp $filetmp $file
